name: Merrick
coverLetter:
I have done small rooms as I have just moved my self and my family to the area from the East coast. They live in town and would not be on site needless to say. I have prior Military experience as well as Private Security work as well in the industry and out. I have allways trimmed all my own stuff and with yield of over 10 plus I could bring ready for market on wet trim in no more than 3 day's not even under pressure just working a a steady pace. I'm not sure as to how that stands up to industry standard but it seemed like a pretty good time. I have left the East coast, Jacksonville,FL  because of the industry violence. Brother against Brother and so on. I am excited to learn from the professionals and only offer hard work and open ears. Thanks. 
E.T.M
